title: Chicopee police investigating shooting on Boucher Circle
content:
CHICOPEE -- Police are investigating a shooting on Boucher Circle, in which one person suffered a gunshot wound,according to Police Department spokesman Michael Wilk.
The shooting was reported at 12:50 p.m., when police received a report of a possible house break-in, Wilk said.
Chicopee police, and the Massachusetts State Police Crime Scene Services were investigating.
"There is no danger to any residents and we are asking people, if possible, avoid this area while detectives process the scene," Wilk said in a news release. "We will update when further information is available"
